question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Kaip vadinasi 2004 m. Kanazavos mieste Japonijoje atidarytas šiuolaikiniam menui skirtas muziejus?
answer: 2004 metais Kanazavos mieste Japonijoje atidarytas muziejus, skirtas šiuolaikiniam menui, vadinasi 21-ojo amžiaus šiuolaikinio meno muziejus (21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art).
answer_translated_eng: In 2004, a museum dedicated to contemporary art opened in Kanazawa, Japan, called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
